newsitem.title: KUWAIT: Egypt team to discuss food exports to Kuwait.
newsitem.headline: Egypt team to discuss food exports to Kuwait.

text.p: Egyptian business representatives will visit Kuwait on Tuesday to promote the export of food and agricultural products to the Gulf Arab state.
An Egyptian embassy official said the private sector team would seek to increase Egyptian food exports to Kuwait during the four-day visit.
"They will offer a wide range of products like vegetables, fruits, rice, sugar, dairy products in addition to canned foods, food preservatives and other goods," the official added.
Egyptian exports to Kuwait, which do not include military hardware, are worth about $70 million a year compared to Kuwaiti exports to Egypt of almost $20 million, diplomats said.
